sentences.en: Add the oats to thicken the mixture and stir until it is nice and creamy.
sentences.cn: 加上燕麦让混合料变稠，然后搅拌成奶油状。

sentences.en: Beat the mixture well, until it is light and creamy.
sentences.cn: 充分搅拌混合物, 直到它松软得像奶油一样.

sentences.en: Blend  the butter with the sugar and beat until light and creamy.
sentences.cn: 把糖掺入黄油然后搅拌至滑软细腻。

sentences.en: Blend the butter with the sugar and beat until light and creamy.
sentences.cn: 把糖掺入黄油然后搅拌至滑软细腻。

sentences.en: Continue whisking until the mixture looks smooth and creamy.
sentences.cn: 一直搅拌，直至混合物变得均匀细腻。

sentences.en: Despite its very low fat content, it is deliciously creamy.
sentences.cn: 虽然脂肪含量很少, 但是味美似乳脂.

sentences.en: He tore open the creamy envelope that had been enclosed in the letter.
sentences.cn: 他撕开了随信寄来的奶油色信封。
这东西有奶油的香甜味道.

sentences.en: Stir the mixture until it looks creamy.
sentences.cn: 将混合料搅拌至乳脂状.

sentences.en: Style: Dry white medium - bodied, creamy vanilla oak and fruity taste.
sentences.cn: 风格: 干白,中度酒体, 香草橡木奶油气味.

sentences.en: The creamy white flowers are attractive in the spring.
sentences.cn: 在春天，这种乳白色的花朵分外迷人。

sentences.en: This yoghurt has a deliciously creamy flavour.
sentences.cn: 这酸奶有一种香甜的奶油味。

sentences.en: Traditional cheesemaking skills give our brie its soft, supple, creamy texture.
sentences.cn: 用传统干酪制作技术制成的布里干酪柔软，不易裂开，而且口感细滑。

sentences.en: Very creamy skin, very big eyes, very dark eyes.
sentences.cn: 皮肤非常光润,像奶油, 眼睛非常大, 眼球儿非常黑.

sentences.en: Whisk the mixture until it is smooth and creamy.
sentences.cn: 把混合物搅拌至均匀细腻。

words.tran_cn: 奶油，乳脂；精华；面霜；乳酪
奶油分离器；盛奶油的器皿；制作奶油的人

trans.tran_cn: 含奶油的，光滑细腻的，奶油色的
